document.full_text: before his death this month, arthur laurents gave his blessing to a new film version of 'gypsy,' possibly starring barbra streisand, and finished a full-length play and his third memoir.
document.title: laurents left book, play and plan for 'gypsy' film
lines_and_colors: before his death this month, arthur laurents gave his blessing to a new film version of 'gypsy,' possibly starring barbra streisand, and finished a full-length play and his third memoir.
